title: Create the Gapminder dataset
text:
# Import necessary libraries
import pandas as pd
from gapminder import gapminder

# Rename 'lifeExp' to 'life_expectancy' and 'gdpPercap' to 'gdp_per_capita'
gapminder = gapminder.rename(columns={'lifeExp': 'life_expectancy',
                                      'pop': 'population_millions', 
                                      'gdpPercap': 'gdp_per_capita'})

# Convert population to millions
gapminder['population_millions'] = gapminder['population_millions'] / 1_000_000

# Create a new pandas DataFrame from the modified gapminder data
gapminder_df = pd.DataFrame(gapminder)

# Save the DataFrame as a CSV file
gapminder_df.to_csv('gapminder.csv', index=False)

# Print the first 3 rows of the DataFrame
print(gapminder_df.head(3))

title: Life Expectancy and GDP per Capita
text:
Life Expectancy vs. GDP per Capita
This page analyzes the relationship between life expectancy and GDP per capita.


Sample R code (or Python, depending on your setup)
plot(1:10, (1:10)^2, type=‘b’, col=‘blue’, main=“Example Graph”)

title: Country Analysis
text:
Country Analysis
This page analyzes changes in life expectancy, GDP per capita, and population over time.

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

years = np.arange(1960, 2020, 1)
life_expectancy = 50 + 0.5 * (years - 1960) + np.random.normal(0, 1, len(years))

plt.figure(figsize=(8, 5))
plt.plot(years, life_expectancy, color='red', linestyle='-', marker='o', alpha=0.6)
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("Life Expectancy (Years)")
plt.title("Life Expectancy Over Time")
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()

title: Life Expectancy and Population
text:
Life Expectancy vs. Population
This page explores the correlation between life expectancy and population.
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import numpy as np


Simulated data
population = np.logspace(5, 9, 100) life_expectancy = 50 + 10 * np.log10(population / 1e5)
plt.figure(figsize=(8, 5)) plt.scatter(population, life_expectancy, color=‘green’, alpha=0.6) plt.xscale(“log”) plt.xlabel(“Population (Log Scale)”) plt.ylabel(“Life Expectancy (Years)”) plt.title(“Life Expectancy vs. Population”) plt.grid(True) plt.show()
